consolePage.disconnectedMessage: Console got disconnected. We will try to reconnect once the server is back.

dashboard.title: Macquarie Cloud Services: Dashboard
dashboard.description: The following graphs roll up information based on the selected Virtual Data Centre.

servers.title: Macquarie Cloud Services: Servers
servers.errorMessage: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of servers.

contextualHelp.intellicentre: Virtual Data Centre to deploy this Server in.
contextualHelp.serverName: Starting from an existing server's configuration helps you get a new server up and running quicker.
contextualHelp.network: DHCP mode: You'll get a lease with an IP address on boot. Static Pool mode: this will give you the next available IP in the static pool.
contextualHelp.cloneServer: When you clone a server you get an identical copy of the existing server. it will have the same compute, storage and network characteristics. You can change the properties of server once it has been deployed.
contextualHelp.provisioningNotifications:
We're currently deploying your stack. Your servers will soon be provisioned and ready.

You can watch the state of provisioning as each step evolves.

createSelfManagedServer.invalidServerName: Server name can only contain letters, numbers or hypen

manageServices.title: Manage Services
manageServices.description: Ensure your server is fully protected. Enable and configure managed services for this server.

performanceScale.sliderGuidance: Move the slider to select the new compute size for this VM.
performanceScale.customGuidance: Enter a custom size for this VM.
performanceScale.warning: Scaling the Server will require a restart.

memory.invalid: Memory size must be a multiple of {{multiple}} MB

validationError.cpu: Number of CPU should not exceed {{available_cpu}}

storage.label: Storage
storage.title: Manage Disks
storage.deleteStorageAlertMessage: The data on {{disk_name}} will be lost forever.
storage.deleteStorageConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this volume?
storage.reachedStorageLimit: You've reached the maximum number of disks for this server.
storage.fullStorageSpace: You can’t add additional disks to this server because there is insufficient storage capacity (0 GB remaining).

serverIpAddress.ipAddressRangeError: IP Address must be in the range ({{ip_range}})

tickets.title: Macquarie Cloud Services: Tickets
tickets.description: Below is the list of your Macquarie Cloud Services tickets.
tickets.errorMessage: Sorry, something’s not right. We weren’t able to retrieve the list of tickets.

createTicket.description:
We all need help from time to time.

Our qualified team of Hosting Management Centre professionals are on standby 24x7 to help you get to the bottom of your issue.

Provide us with as much information as you can and we'll take a look.

Existing tickets can be viewed and managed in MacquarieView.
createTicket.headline: Headline (max {{max_char}} characters)

contextualHelp.headline: A short title that describes this ticket.
contextualHelp.details: Please provide as much information as you can and describe any attempts made to remedy the problem
contextualHelp.services: Choose the service type this ticket relates to.
contextualHelp.attachments: Optionally attach screenshots or other files to this support ticket by dragging and dropping into this area from your computer (limit 1 file).

tools.title: Macquarie Cloud Services: Other Tools
tools.description: Macquarie Cloud Services have all the tools you need to manage your compute workloads. Occasionally you may want to do something that's not possible in the Macquarie Cloud Services portal, but available in our partner portals. You have permission to access the following partner portals.

vCloud.name: Vcloud Director
vCloud.description: Manage your virtual machines and Virtual Data Centers.

vSphere.description: Manage every detail of your virtual data centres.
